entry.title: Octopress Posting
entry.content:
Markdown Basic

Markdown Wiki
Official Markdown project at Daring Fireball

Markdown Code Syntax

some code

`some code`
Octopress Code Block Syntax
``` [language] [title] [url] [link text]
some code
```
Octopress Posting

sh rake new_post["title"] rake new_page[about] # creates source/about/index.markdown -> site.com/about/index.html rake new_page[about/me.html] # creates source/about/me.markdown -> site.com/about/me.html rake generate rake preview # and localhost:4000 rake deploy
